キラーは時間待機無しで24時間マッチング可能なので、対人ゲームお好きな人はお勧めです。しかし技術も必要なので最初勝てないかもしれないので慣れるまで我慢しましょう。MAPが把握できれば大体、感で敵を見つけれるようになります。パーク自分なりの作戦が見事に刺さって勝利すると気持ち良いです。

In short, this game does have a problem with a few things but I'm not listing them all here.. most Dead by Daylight players know this.. However, if you're not too worried about all those issues (like some unbalanced factors), the game is still fun in my opinion. I switched to PC recently so actually played DBD prior to my 300 hours on this device (around 1000 on console) and still have a great time.

I play this game almost daily, I enjoy it regardless of how "broken" people say it is. Yes you will have bad games and good games, but if you're not strictly playing for the win you can actually have a great time in my opinion. And for new players there is a range of killers and survivors to choose from, the idea of the game is nice and besides it isn't too late for the Dev team to actually make the game better - which they probably will in due time. I say give the game more time and with new players being introduced, the Dev team will fix some things (HOPEFULLY).

This game is very addictive!! There are often times when "one more game" turns into four or five more. Playing with friends makes the game more enjoyable and gives you a little more assurance that your team knows what they're doing (assuming that people play with a four man like mine try to do). Like every other game, this one has some downsides to accompany the fun parts of the game. Overall, I actually frequently recommend the game to people, playing it, and enjoy telling people about.
You will most likely get pissed a lot of times that you'll end up deleting this game. Not recommend it.

played for hundreds of hours with everything on game pass for pc. 
doesnt matter if you are good or bad, trash internet or 0 ping, its a coin flip if you will have fun or not even if you're playing with friends.
killer is either boring where you almost fall asleep or the most stressful, rage inducing match.
survivor is the most un-interactive game just hold left click then click space. 
and if you get chased (not even scary to be chased unless this is like your first horror game)
just hold 'w' and run in a circle. not to mention the toxic community. BHVR ;The Devs have made mistake after mistake, and never have gone back on their god awful choices. This game features Pay-To-Win mechanics like, almost every killer perk build has perks from multiple DLCs. don't waste 20 dollars there are plenty other games better for this price or lower.
It will take one game with good devs and mechanics then dead by daylight will be Dethroned. 
either the devs will finally get to doing a good job or will fall.
(edit) i played one match because i was bored and looking in my library i joined one game after 4 minutes of searching got in and was lagging so badly. i know it was the game since my video was playing at 1080p 60fps without any freezes, further more my other teammates were over 150 ping easily, yet i was on "70 ping" i haven't played in a week so i was kinda rusty, i get matched with a prestiged 3 ghost face with meta perks. knew to wait out my dead hard and was sweaty by all means. no depth to the game play. can be described in 4 sentances

survivors: hold leftclick and space sometimes, when chased just run foward.

killer: every second counts so watch best perks for ____ killer and sweat since survivors are usually sweaty, toxic, and entitled. 

(i know i seem entitled but when i mainly played this game i would laugh instead of complain of how bad my mistakes and my trash teammates. this just put me over the edge)

community in game: toxic annoying and the type to try to dox you if you dont drop everything to go and save them.

community outside on discord,youtube, etc. : Welcoming, funny content creators like The JRM, Good players like Probzz, one thing i did notice is content is milked dry when there is an update and video ideas are repeated. not the content creator's fault but is just the fact that there is barely content in this game
